events.message: We have received the candidate's resume and cover letter for the software engineer position, expressing strong interest in our backend development team.
The application has been categorized under the Engineering cluster as it mentions experience in software development and devops pipelines.
Recruiter Jane Smith has been assigned to manage the candidate’s recruiting process for the engineer position.
The initial screening interview was conducted, and the candidate demonstrated solid understanding of software engineering principles.
The candidate responded promptly, expressing enthusiasm about the company’s tech stack and excitement for the next interview phase.
The technical interview has been scheduled for May 6th to assess coding skills and problem-solving abilities in a live coding environment.
